links.description: The markets sure moves fast these days, the S&P 500 was down by nearly 6 percent this week! $1.1 trillion in market cap wiped off the S&P 500 over the past two days, and $1.5 trillion for the week! So you think the trade wars totals will amount that much?

links.title: A New App Aims To Take The Guesswork And Anxiety Out Of Trading
links.description: To the novice trader or even some experienced investors, the biggest hurdle in the path of maintaining a trading career is generally the lack of clear or consistent guidance or means of stock discovery. Broker services like robo advisors and charting, analytics or research platforms are a huge boon for traders who know how to read the charts and key in what exactly they're looking for.

links.title: Facebook Stock Flashes Multiple Sell Signals Amid Cambridge Analytica Data Scandal | Stock News & Stock Market Analysis - IBD
links.description: Despite positive assessments from Wall Street, Facebook ( FB) shares are telling a different story as the social media giant's stock triggers multiple IBD sell signals. Fallout from the Cambridge Analytica scandal hasn't helped Facebook, but last week's data breach wasn't the beginning of the stock's troubles, suggesting a deeper issue than just the mishandling of consumer information.

links.title: Tim Cook to co-chair China Development Forum this weekend amidst international tariff threats
links.description: Running from tomorrow until Sunday, global business leaders are converging in China to talk with local government about their relationship. This year, Apple CEO Tim Cook is a co-chair at the conference. Relations with China are definitely more strained than usual at the moment.
